    • isSafeToBuild

      public boolean isSafeToBuild(String schematicName, org.bukkit.Location start)
      Check if the area is safe to build if:
      - The room wouldn't hit another room
      - The start location is on the grid
      Parameters:
      schematicName - The schematic name to check
      start - The location to check
      Returns:
      False if not safe to build otherwise true

    • safeClaim

      public AbstractRoom safeClaim(Class<? extends AbstractRoom> roomClass, String schematicName, org.bukkit.Location start)
      Tries to claim a room on a given location if:
      - The room wouldn't hit another room
      - The start location is on the grid

      To actually see the physical room you need to call AbstractRoom.placeDown()
      Parameters:
      roomClass - The class to make a new instance of
      schematicName - The schematic to claim at the start location
      start - The location to claim it
      Returns:
      Null if the claim wasn't concluded or the room reference which has been created
